snippet: A six-figure check will buy unlimited access to powerful politicians.
abstract: Editorial contends Supreme Court decision in case McCutcheon v Federal Election Commission will give big political donors more influence over political parties; maintains that while Chief Justice John Roberts Jr does not consider the ruling as enabling corruption, donors know that American politics is now for sale, and they are ready to buy.
lead_paragraph: A six-figure check will buy unlimited access to powerful politicians.

headline.seo: The Campaign Finance Ruling Helps Big Donors
headline.main: How to Squeeze the Political Parties
headline.print_headline: How to Squeeze the Political Parties

keywords.value: McCutcheon v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
